page.title: 19A Schoolgirl 2
page.content: I am Vicki Bliss and I am 9 years old. I am 1.34m and weigh 26kg. I have dark blue eyes and light complexion.I wear glasses for school work. I like wearing skirts and dresses. My hobbies are horse riding, swimming, playing tennis and cricket and also writing. I am a little bit messy at home and I don't like to be told off - but I do like work. I get upset very easily but I do argue a bit. I like school a lot. At home I usually play outside the front of our house in South Street on my rollerboots or sometimes in my backyard. If it is raining I play indoors in my bedroom with my toy Little Ponies. I go to Brownies and like it a lot. I am not a shy person and I like going on the stage.
